definition: (of an area) to have trees with shade-giving foliage/(of a road) to be tree-lined

sentences.english: The campus boasts elegant environment with green plants and fragrant flowers, which is excellent for learning and living.
sentences.chinese: 校园环境幽雅，绿树成荫，鸟语花香，宜学宜居。

sentences.english: Here by "the red tile greenery, the blue sea blue sky" is celebrated worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 这里以“红瓦绿树，碧海蓝天”著称于世。

sentences.english: My dream city is the one with red tiling, green trees, blue sea and clear sky.
sentences.chinese: 就是红瓦绿树碧海蓝天，我就觉得挺好的。

sentences.english: Three sheep and three geese are under a green tree.
sentences.chinese: 三只羊和三只鹅在绿树的下面。

sentences.english: Planting schemes were dominated by indigenous species of evergreens and hardwoods.
sentences.chinese: 种植计划的主要是常绿树和硬木原生品种。

sentences.english: London is blessed with plenty of parks and tree-lined streets.
sentences.chinese: 伦敦有许多的公园和绿树成荫的街道。

sentences.english: The trees like the longings of the earth stand a tiptoe to peep at the heaven.
sentences.chinese: 绿树仿佛在表示对大地的渴望，踮起脚尖，窥视天空。

sentences.english: The platinum temple on all sides and green tree lawn, the fresh flowers glorious , the environment very daintiness.
sentences.chinese: 白金汉宫四周绿树草地，鲜花锦簇，环境极其优美。

sentences.english: Boulevard, tree-lined, paths on both sides of flowers numerous and leafy.
sentences.chinese: 大道两旁绿树成荫，小道两边花繁叶茂。

sentences.english: From the parking lot, visitors descend a tree-lined staircase down a steep slope.
sentences.chinese: 参观者可以从停车位走下绿树成荫的楼梯，进入斜坡。

sentences.english: All cottages are enclosed by green trees.
sentences.chinese: 所有的村舍都被绿树所包围。

sentences.english: The folks live peacefully and abundantly in the village surrounded with green trees and slender bamboos.
sentences.chinese: 绿树和修竹环抱着村子，人们幸福平和地居住在这里。

sentences.english: City Library is a tree the embrace of a beautiful place.
sentences.chinese: 市图书馆是一个绿树怀抱的美丽的地方。

sentences.english: She lives on a broad, tree-lined street.
sentences.chinese: 她住的那条街街道宽阔，两边绿树成荫。

sentences.english: The "Tree-hugger Award" is recognition of eco-friendliness.
sentences.chinese: 环抱绿树奖项是一项环境友好的认证。

sentences.english: Since precious, it should let it clear out, the two sides tree-shaded.
sentences.chinese: 既然珍贵，那就更要让它清澈见底，两岸绿树成荫。

definition: (of an area) to have trees with shade-giving foliage/(of a road) to be tree-lined
hidden from view/alternately hidden and visible/setting off each other
verdant/lush green and full of life
evergreen pine and cypress (idiom); steadfast nobility
lit. birdsong and fragrant flowers (idiom); fig. the intoxication of a beautiful spring day
green grass like cushion (idiom); green meadow so inviting to sleep on
lit. green hills and clear waters/pleasant country scene (idiom)
